DOC.brief_summary: This study compare efficacy modify William 's airway versus U shape Guedl 's airway assistant fiberoptic bronchoscope endotracheal intubation
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Between Modified William 's Airway U Shaped Guedl 's Airway
DOC.detailed_description: Several oropharyngeal airway supraglotic device invent facilitate art fiber optic intubation . The oropharyngeal airways help fiber optic intubation raise soft palate tongue away field bronchoscope . ( 1 ) The modification make Williams airway ( Fekry 's airway ) roof proximal cylindrical tunnel remove open concave part allow one step insertion tube . There need removal tube connector airway tube insertion . ( 3 ) We invent new modification Guedel 's airway ( The U-shaped Guedel 's airway ) make make inverted Y shape cut roof airway keep proximal Y wing remove distal part roof.This study conduct Kasr AL-Ainy Hospital Faculty Medicine Cairo university Egypt , approval ethical committee take write informed consent patient . Patients present hospital elective surgery general anasethia randomly divide 2 group : Group W ( Gw ) ( n=25 ) fiber optic intubation assist modify Williams airway Group U ( Gu ) ( n=25 ) fiber optic intubation assist U shape Guedels airway . In preparation room 20 guage cannula insert peripheral vein . 0,02 mg\ Kg midazolam 0,01 mg\Kg atropine give operate room Standard monitor ( ECG , noninvasive Blood pressure pulse oximetry ) establish patient .After 3 minute preoxygenation 100 % O2 induction conduct use 1Âµg\Kg fentanyl,2mg\Kg propofol 0.05 mg\Kg atracurium . After loss consciousness select airway accord group randomization insert mouth ( size selection technique insertion do accord manufacturer structure . The patient ventilate facemask bag 100 % oxygen 1-2 % isoflourane . Complete neuromuscular block confirm use nerve stimulator ( train four zero ) .the fiber optic bronchoscope insert airway ( modified Williams , U Shaped Guedels airway ) accord patient group . The time fiber optic bronchoscope insertion record second ( defined time elapse entry fiber optic bronchoscope airway till touch vocal cord tip bronchoscope ) . The investigator assesse bronchoscopic view end airway . record time fiberopticbronchoscope insertion endotracheal tube slide vocal cord trachea reach carina . patient ventilate endotracheal tube use intermittent positive pressure ventilation ( IPPV ) . Endotracheal intubation confirm chest expansion , bilateral equal air entry use stethoscope appearance 6 successive capnographic wave . Time intubation record stop mask-bag ventilation till reventilate patient use endotrachealtube reading capnogram . ( attempt cancel bag-mask ventilation start SPO2 reach 93 % . )
DOC.criteria: Patient age 18 year old . Patient ASA I , II . Patient Ganzouri airway score less 4 . Patient age 18 year old . Patient ASA III , IV . Patients risk aspiration gastric content . Patient Ganzouri airway score equal 4 . Patient anatomical abnormality invalidate Ganzouri airway score .
